name: BNNSLayerParametersNormalization
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a normalization layer.

items.name: init(i_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, beta_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, gamma_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, moving_mean_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, moving_variance_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, momentum: Float, epsilon: Float, activation: BNNSActivation, num_groups: Int, normalization_axis: Int)
items.desc: Returns a new normalization layer parameters structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new normalization layer parameters structure.

items.name: var beta_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the beta or bias.

items.name: var gamma_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the gamma or scale.

items.name: var moving_mean_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the moving mean.

items.name: var moving_variance_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the moving variance.

items.name: var momentum: Float
items.desc: A value, between 0 and 1, the normalization operation uses to update the moving mean and moving variance during training.

items.name: var epsilon: Float
items.desc: The epsilon in the computation of the standard deviation.

items.name: var activation: BNNSActivation
items.desc: The activation function that the layer applies to the output.

items.name: var num_groups: Int
items.desc: The number of groups over which the layer computes normalization statistics.

items.name: var normalization_axis: Int
items.desc: The axis on which a layer normalization operation starts normalization.
